sentences.english: And ChengYi aspects also have no confidence for the hearing, then to predecessors Xiao Yongguang for help.
sentences.chinese: 而承義方面亦對聆訊毫無信心，便向前輩蕭永光求助。

sentences.english: Three political parties yesterday backed calls for an inquiry into the Gary Cheng Kai-nam scandal.
sentences.chinese: 三個政黨昨日表態支持就程介南事件進行聆訊。

sentences.english: Court date set for Chinese student in the US.
sentences.chinese: 吻癱美國機場的中國留學生聆訊日期確定。

sentences.english: Posner argued that there’s no need for a further hearing.
sentences.chinese: 波斯納主張這一問題並無進一步聆訊的必要。

sentences.english: Thursday's hearing was on Zhao's motion to dismiss the lawsuit.
sentences.chinese: 星期四的聆訊旨在討論趙致真取消這一案件的動議。

sentences.english: Tapes of the hearing showed she had verbally pleaded guilty.
sentences.chinese: 聆訊錄音顯示她親口認罪。

sentences.english: B3. Have you filed and served witness statement(s) before the case is listed for hearing?
sentences.chinese: 案件排期聆訊前，證人陳述書是否已存檔及送達？

definition: preliminary hearing/interrogation (of a suspect)/preliminary examination (of a project etc)
on trial (for a crime)/to stand trial
to re-investigate/to investigate and reconsider a judgment
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
